================================
### ITQ - Infrastructure Maintenance and Repair Services for Coldbrook Fish Hatchery

**Title:** ITQ - EB144-250273 - Infrastructure Maintenance and Repair Services for Coldbrook Fish Hatchery Water Control Structure Enhancement
**Publication Date:** 2024-06-04
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-18T14:00:00
**Procurement Category:** *Infra construction services for buildings
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to participate in the ITQ process for the Coldbrook Fish Hatchery Water Control Structure Enhancement project. The project aims to improve worker operational safety and efficiency at the Coldbrook Hatchery water control structure located about five kilometers west of Kentville, Nova Scotia.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of work for this project includes, but is not limited to, the following:

* Installation of downstream siltation protection and removal of siltation at the upstream face of the existing water control structure
* Removal and replacement of the water control structure deck and guards, including fabrication, supply, and installation of new parts
* Fabrication, supply, and installation of new spillway gates, fixed manual mechanical actuation equipment, and miscellaneous new supports
* Sluice gates inspections and supply and installation of new sluice gate mechanical actuation equipment and related miscellaneous components
* Fabrication, supply, and installation of new steel and HDPE trash racks at the sluice gates as shown on the drawings

A pre-qualification process is conducted for this tender. Specifications and drawings will be provided to qualified companies in a subsequent Invitation to Tender (ITT) process.
